caption.p: Cartoon model of the structural superposition between the homology model of the 2019‐nCoV in blue and the spike glycoprotein of SARS coronavirus (PDB code 6acc.1) in orange. The red circle highlights the presence of a variable region on the 2019‐nCoV at the beginning of the protein, whereas the blue square highlights the presence of two beta‐sheets on the 2019‐nCoV (401:KYR and 440:LND) that are not present on the SARS‐CoV structure; SARS, severe acute respiratory syndrome
